reviewText:
THIS is one of my ALL TIME BEST centerfold videos that Playboy did back in 1989. It stars a very dear and lovely friend of mine, Ms, Fawna MacLaren. If you Don't have this edition, you should! It was WELL DONE all the way through! The music, the scenery and Fawna herself are just amazingly hot! You not only get to see FAWNA herself in a tantalizing video as she talks about her life in general, on love, modeling, traveling, and the like, you get 2 other HOT playmates from the era.
The "runner up" contenders are Erika Eleniak and the late Jennifer Jackson.
Unfortunately, Jennifer Jackson died several years ago from a heroin overdose, according to her husband. Anything she did for playboy was well done.
One day hope to get this edition on Laserdisc!  My VHS edition is getting worn out!
** Program also has a "Playmate Plus" at the end of the VHS where we take a look back on 3 "vintage" playmates **
